revisions.*:
{{StatsTopicTOC}}
This list of '''[[statistician]]s''' lists people who have made notable contributions to the theories or application of [[statistics]], or to the related fields of [[probability]] or [[machine learning]]. Also included are [[actuary|actuaries]] and [[demography|demographers]].
__NOTOC__

| seealso = yes
| nobreak = yes
| extlinks = yes
